column5: Welcome to my beautiful home in a quiet, well landscaped neighborhood in North central Arlington. Two bedrooms and shared living and kitchen are yours to enjoy for your stay. Rangers, Cowboys stadiums, Arlington Convention center are 8 minutes by car. Drive to UTA, College Central, or Levitt Pavilion (free outdoor concert venue) in the newly renovated downtown Arlington in only 5 minutes.
column8: Comfy digs in Arlington near Rangers & Cowboys!
